  • Classes in mpmToolbox.projectData.alignment used by mpmToolbox.gui.audio 
    Class and Description
    Alignment
    This class links all MSM note elements with expression data (milliseconds.date, milliseconds.date.end, velocity).
    Note
    An MSM note element plus some performance data such as milliseconds.date, milliseconds.date.end and velocity.
    PianoRoll
    This represents a piano roll image including dedicated functionality.
  • Classes in mpmToolbox.projectData.alignment used by mpmToolbox.gui.audio.utilities 
    Class and Description
    Note
    An MSM note element plus some performance data such as milliseconds.date, milliseconds.date.end and velocity.
  • Classes in mpmToolbox.projectData.alignment used by mpmToolbox.projectData.alignment 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAlignmentComputation
    Abstract class for implementation of audio-to-symbolic music alignment algorithms.
    Note
    An MSM note element plus some performance data such as milliseconds.date, milliseconds.date.end and velocity.
    Part
    An instance of this is a Hashmap of all MSM notes, accessed via their XML ID.
    PianoRoll
    This represents a piano roll image including dedicated functionality.
